articles.title: Piers Morgan Doubles Down With Prince Harry Rebuke; Harry Prepares For Return To UK - Deadline
articles.description: The former newspaper editor was targeted by Harry following his court victory against Mirror Group Newspapers.
articles.content: The bad blood between Prince Harry and Piers Morgan shows no sign of evaporating, with the broadcaster responding sharply to news of Harry’s courtroom victory over Morgan’s former employer this week.… [+2308 chars]
